title: FPS Issue
body: 2 days ago I didn't play League then yesterday I start a game to find I have 10 FPS when I used to get 60 FPS. I have updated my drivers and everything. I have 8GB of RAM and nothing seems out of order. Please help.

replies.body: hmm that's weird I got 180 a week ago it went down to 100 I didn't care as well its still 100 ping lol
